title: Clear Channel Becomes IHeartMedia And Dominates Radio Market
teaser: Clear Channel Communications -- now known as IHeartMedia -- is the country's largest owner of radio stations. The company's CEO on why radio is as popular as ever.
contentencoded:
Clear Channel Communications — now known as IHeartMedia — is the country’s largest owner of radio stations.

CEO Bob Pittman joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to explain why IHeartMedia is interested in the radio market, and his own personal connection to radio, an industry he’s been involved in since he was 15 years old.

Guest

  • Bob Pittman, CEO of IHeartMedia. He tweets @PittmanRadio.
